example.name: actor1
example.text: He says that the media in Taiwan are extremely competitive, * pointing out that the desire * to scoop a domestic news story means *0* that there is little enthusiasm for cooperation; participants would likely squabble over first broadcast rights and programming content.
example.arg: over first broadcas rights and programming content.
